import { Fragment } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Cart({cart, setCartItems}) { return ( <>

Your Cart: {cart.length}

{cart.map((item) => (

Your Cart: {cartItems.length} items

{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.product.name}

${item.product.price}

decreaseQty(item)}>- increaseQty(item)}>+
removeItem(item)} class="fa fa-trash btn btn-danger">
) )}

Order Summary

Subtotal: {cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=> (acc + item.qty), 0)} (Units)

Est. total: ${Number(cartItems.reduce((acc,item)=> (acc + item.product.price * item.qty), 0)).toFixed(2)}

 )) }

Order Summary

Subtotal: 1 (Units)

Est. total: $245.67

) } export default Cart
